data.fullContent: Social responsibility is a term that refers to a collective set of obligations that businesses have toward society as a whole. It is a set of moral, social, and legal principles that companies must follow. Social responsibility is especially important for businesses that have a high degree of control over society and the people living in it. For example, manufacturing companies have a responsibility to produce their goods in ecologically friendly ways. And all businesses are obliged to provide their employees with safe, humane working conditions.
